DOC.brief_summary: Asthma among low-income, minority children remains a prime example of health disparities that are resistant to change. Controlled demonstrations of reductions in disproportionate hospital or emergency care are limited. We performed a controlled clinical trial of an "Asthma Coach" to reduce hospitalizations among low-income, African American children.
DOC.brief_title: Case Management and Environmental Control in Asthma
DOC.criteria: 28 years of age Admitted to hospital for acute asthma African American ethnicity Medicaid coverage Parent refusal to sign consent Living outside service area
